skins.shipDescription: Nevada-class battleship ¨C Nevada, Hull Number BB-36!
skins.selfIntroduction: Yo! I'm the big sister of the Nevada-class battleships, Nevada! I served in both the Atlantic and Pacific fleets. The President was once on board me, I've changed kidneys, carried two atomic bombs, and even cleared out an entire battlefield!
skins.acquisition: Are you the commander, young man? I'm Nevada. I'll be working with you from here on out.
skins.details: At times like these, I tend to like your mindfulness...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Gambling? I'm not usually interested, but I'll give it a shot with you if you're up for it!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, go do what you want while you're still young!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Bantry Bay Squadron? I just missed my chance, you see...
skins.secretaryTouch: Who knew you were a people person?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Are you that interested in my 'priority defenses'?

skins.shipDescription: Heh, with this, I won't be outperformed by those fancy greenhorn battleships. Young'un, from now on, just leave everything to Nevada here!
skins.acquisition: Heh, with this, I won't be outperformed by those fancy greenhorn battleships. Young'un, from now on, just leave everything to Nevada here!
skins.login: Nevada, always ready for your orders!
skins.details: Commander, want to go horseback riding together? It doesn't matter if you don't know how, just hang on to my waist!
skins.secretaryIdle1: That Oklahoma, she's ain't so wet behind the ears anymore. Soon she's gonna be all independent.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Though fighting can't eliminate every problem in the world, it certainly can eliminate most of those who would cause problems.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, I've got your back, so you can keep charging forward!
skins.secretaryTouch: So, you fancy a dance with the devil? As you can see, I'm ready to up the ante. Young'un, what are you going to wager?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, can I... change my wager?
